item.description: Join us Monday evening at the Boston Billiards at 7:00pm. Enter Boston Billiards and take an immediate left.  You should see an area with tables straight ahead.  We occupy most of the tables in this area.  Look for the tables with stacks of games and people trying to decide what to play.
item.how_to_find_us: In the Boston Billiard, go to the table area. Ask for Robert, Bill or Bobbi.

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Monday Meetup
